name: Car Crush Racing Simulator
description: Car Crush Racing Simulator is an awesome, fast-paced, off-road racing game where you have to skillfully dodge all the state of art Car Crushing Machines and reach the finish line before everyone else. This adrenaline-pumping extreme sports game will have you at the edge of your seat. Get lots of airtime by driving over cool bumps and ramps performing some astounding stunts. Keeping your vehicle safe is extremely important as you try to keep out of harm's way in a high-intensity obstacle environment. Beware that you have to be extremely careful and stop just at the right place. Right then, it’s time to test your reaction time and have some real fun.
publishers: Enaayah Software Development and Services Private
